name: Sticky-me
description:
Use W and S to move blues

Use I and K to move reds (Up arrow and Down arrow works as well)

R to restart the current level

SPACEBAR or Left Mouse Click to skip intros

PROTIPS
  • Surfaces that don't move are more sticky that the ones that move.
  • You cannot stick to ice
  • You can stick to walls.
  • Let gravity help you.

A game made for Ludum Dare 33 Jam

by tinglo and fonserbc

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...
